name: Nika's Story
description:
A short, experimental platformer about how we grow. Made for Rainbow Jam--January 2017.

It's a choppy little thing; I'm not used to animation and couldn't quite figure out how to make the transitions reliable, but it's got heart.

Ambient theme is:

Lost Frontier Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
